text:
Delighterr | Fremont | Lead full stack engineer
Delighterr is stealth startup with cal founders and seed funding from top silicon valley ex-ceo. we are looking for a lead full stack engineer to develop our offering working closely with pilot customers. We are looking for engineer with passion to develop scalable web apps using PHP, Node.js, Python or Ruby, jQuery, Angular.jsm, HTML5/CSS3, MySQL, integrations with RESTful APIs. contact baker@delighterr.com with your info.
